name: signature-pdf
description: signaturepdf is a self-hosted tool to digitally sign PDFs from the browser. Users can upload, place signatures, and download signed documents without sending files to third-party services.
features: Browser-based signing: Signs PDFs entirely in the browser without server uploads.
Signature drawing: Creates signatures by drawing with mouse or touchscreen.
Text signatures: Generates typed signatures with customizable fonts.
Image signatures: Uploads signature images from files for placement on PDFs.
Multi-page support: Places signatures on any page of multi-page documents.
Signature positioning: Drag and resize signature placement with visual editor.
Date stamping: Automatically adds signing date alongside signatures.
Privacy focused: Processes PDFs client-side without storing documents on server.
No registration: Signs documents without creating accounts or logging in.
Download signed PDFs: Saves signed documents directly to your device.
Mobile friendly: Works on smartphones and tablets for signing on the go.
Multiple signatures: Adds multiple signatures to different pages or locations.
